snippet.title: Ludum Dare 55 | Cadence Crisis Gameplay - GameJam
snippet.description:
🔶Link to download the game : https://alldee.itch.io/cadence-crisis

👉 Note : 

This game was created during "Ludum Dare 55" in just 72 hours by a team of five friends, all united around the theme "Summoning". 

It's a cross between a rhythm game and a tower defense game, set in a post-apocalyptic universe where artificial intelligence has taken control of the entire world and eradicated humanity...

But not all humans have disappeared! You play the role of the last survivor, confronted by a gigantic AI boss who evaluates your musical performance to ensure your survival. 

The boss will punish your mistakes by "summoning" his henchmen to eliminate you. 

In this game, the drums are your weapon and your shield. Every note you play with precision strengthens your defenses, while wrong notes will summon more monsters in every wave of the game. 

Keep up the rhythm, string together chords with precision and resist the constant attacks of the AI, all the while hoping to reach a level of performance sufficient to survive. At the end of each round, you can buy turrets to defend yourself against the monsters !

🎵 Musics :

Wellmess feat. Divty - I'm a Hurricane
Wellmess  ft. Coma Svensson - Just To Call You Mine
Sport Trailer Rock [Rock Music] by MokkaMusic / Run Faster
Jeremy Blake - Powerup!
spring gang - Go for Gold
Def Lev - Rock Dawg
Never Gonna Give You Up (8 Bit Remix Cover Version) [Tribute to Rick Astley] - 8 Bit Universe
Believer [8 Bit Tribute to Imagine Dragons] - 8 Bit Universe 
 Centuries (8 Bit Remix Cover Version) [Tribute to Fall Out Boy] - 8 Bit Universe 
 California Gurls (8 Bit Remix Cover Version) [Tribute to Katy Perry] - 8 Bit Universe 
 Seven Nation Army [8 Bit Cover Tribute to The White Stripes] - 8 Bit Universe
Will Harrison - Tired of Fighting Blues

📢Credits : 

🔶Alldee: Tech art, 3D Environment, Lightning, Texturing, Integration, Music Rythm
 https://www.artstation.com/alld 
https://www.linkedin.com/in/athénaïs-cheval-peyre-368a7722a/ 

🔶Johantran : Coding, Integration
 https://www.linkedin.com/in/johan-tran/

🔶Fopie : 2D assets, Animation, UI design, Logo design, Character design.
 https://www.behance.net/fopiebd
 https://www.linkedin.com/in/fopiebd

🔶Lolo : 3D Props, Music Rythm
https://www.artstation.com/loic-hb
https://www.linkedin.com/in/loic-hb/

🔶Reaper : 3D Props, Music Rythm
https://www.linkedin.com/in/alexandre-hubert/
